## ReadableEthersGivety.getGVTYStake() method

Get the current state of an GVTY Stake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getGVTYStake(address?: string, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<GVTYStake>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address that owns the GVTY Stake. |
